name: Afghanistan Humanitarian Aid
socialShareText: Support emergency aid and humanitarian efforts on the ground in Afghanistan and across the globe for Afghan refugees.
about: Support emergency aid and humanitarian efforts on the ground in Afghanistan and across the globe for Afghan refugees.

sponsor.description: Amplify your gift! Generous donors will match you dollar-for-dollar up to $25 each time until we reach $20,000 total matched.

nonprofits.name: International Rescue Committee
nonprofits.about: IRC responds to the world’s worst humanitarian crises & helps people to survive, recover & gain control of their future.

nonprofits.name: Women for Afghan Women
nonprofits.about: Founded in 2001, Women for Afghan Women (WAW) is the largest Afghan women’s rights organization, globally, with over 850 full-time staff operating centers, programs, and services aimed at empowering Afghan women in the United States and Afghanistan.

nonprofits.name: Save the Children
nonprofits.about: Giving children in the U.S. and around the world a healthy start in life, the opportunity to learn and protection from harm.

nonprofits.name: International Refugee Assistance Project: IRAP
nonprofits.about: Provides legal advocacy for refugees and displaced people in need of a safe place to call home.

nonprofits.name: USA for UNHCR
nonprofits.about: USA for UNHCR protects refugees and empowers them with hope and opportunity.

nonprofits.name: Preemptive Love Coalition
nonprofits.about: Providing relief, jobs, & community on the frontlines of conflict. To heal all that's tearing us apart. To end war.

nonprofits.name: No One Left Behind
nonprofits.about: To save and support America's Afghan and Iraqi wartime allies.

nonprofits.name: Central Asia Institute
nonprofits.about: CAI is an international NGO promoting education & literacy, especially for girls, in remote areas of Pakistan, Afghanistan & Tajikistan.

nonprofits.name: School of Leadership, Afghanistan
nonprofits.about: To foster a new leadership generation in Afghanistan by enabling educational opportunity, and promoting in-country, senior management positions for that leadership, especially for Afghan women.

nonprofits.name: Keeping Our Promise
nonprofits.about: A comprehensive resettlement program for our wartime allies.

nonprofits.name: Afghanaid
nonprofits.about: A global charity working with Afghans to give basic services to poor communities.
